content: working in both loops decrease 4sc x3 15 round 6-7 single_crochet in each st around 15 fo after end of round 7 leaving an 8 inch tail for sewing stuff lightly before positioning between both cheeks between rnds 20-23 and sewing along round 7 of nose into place using black yarn or thread embroider eyebrows 5-6 rounds above each eye and form a mouth between the two cheek indents #1 & 4 on face shaping picture on page 4 working with coral pink yarn in continuous rounds make 2 round 1 ch2 6sc in 2nd st from hook 6 round 2 single_crochet in each st around 6 round 3 2sc 2sc in next st x2 8 round 4 3sc 2sc in next st x2 10 round 5 4sc 2sc in next st x2 12 round 6 5sc 2sc in next st x2 14 round 7 single_crochet in each st around 14 round 8 6sc 2sc in next st x2 16 round 9 7sc 2sc in next 16 round 26 single_crochet in each st around 16 fo leaving an 8-10 inch tail for sewing do not stuff place ears on each side of round 3 on top of head sewing along round 26 of ears to secure into place copyright holly s hobbies 2017 www ravelry com/designers/hollys-hobbies 6 starting with bright pink yarn in continuous rounds note body is worked in alternating rounds of bright pink and black yarn rounds that are worked in bright pink will have a p at the beginning of the round and rounds that are working in black will have a b at the beginning of the round you will continue to work in the colour indicated for the following rounds unless it states to change round 1 ch2 6sc in 2nd st from hook 6 round 2 2sc in each st around 12 round 3 1sc 2sc in next st x6 18 round 4 2sc 2sc in next st
